text: My son compulsorily took Higher Chinese Subject when he joined River Valley High School 4 years ago. As a non-Chinese student, studying higher Chinese is really hard although he did good in his primary levels. My son struggled with this subject during his early secondary studies and even failed the exam at one point. After joining Axcell Tuition Centre and under the guidance of Ms. Sherilyn, my son's grade was gradually improved. Today, he received O-level Higher Chinese Exam result. He gets Grade 3B (Merit). I can't help but express my sincere gratitude to Ms. Sherilyn and the Axcell Tuition Center for bringing the best out of my son. Thank you and God bless you all!

Absolutely outstanding tuition center! The educators here are not just teachers; they're mentors who genuinely care about each student's success. My child has shown remarkable improvement in subjects that were once challenging, thanks to the engaging and interactive teaching methods employed here. The environment is welcoming and conducive to learning.

My son attended English lessons when he was in P6. He looked forward to his lessons as he enjoyed learning in Madam Rohanaâ€™s class. A wonderful teacher indeed. Thank you Madam Rohana, we truly appreciate you!

Thank you very much Axcell Tuition Centre for taking in my son, Erhan at a period whereby the preparations for PSLE is just around the corner.
Erhan has indeed made improvements ever since he joined Axcell Tuition Centre.
Very good....My son scored As in the subjects taken at Axcell. Flexible timings as well and well trained teachers.
